item.title: Jon Stewart Rips “Chilling Effect” Hitting Media: “What a F***ing Week”
item.description: Stewart addressed the cancellation of the ‘Late Show’ on his ‘Weekly Show’ podcast Thursday.

item.title: Los Angeles Times Owner Reveals He’s Taking Newspaper Public
item.description: Billionaire Patrick Soon-Shiong made the announcement in an interview with Jon Stewart on ‘The Daily Show.’

item.title: Jon Stewart Slams CBS For Colbert Cancellation: “You Are F***ing Wrong”
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ host breaks silence on his friend and former colleague’s ‘The Late Show’ getting axed and leads the audience in a “go f*** yourself” chant against companies bending the knee to Trump.

item.title: Jon Stewart Is Unsure of ‘The Daily Show’s Future Amid Paramount-Skydance Merger
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ host’s comments came shortly before it was announced that CBS has canceled ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert.’
